import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat', templateUrl: './chat.component.html', styleUrl: './chat.component.css' }) export class ChatComponent { }

Chat with John Doe

Conversation with John Doe

John Doe 12:00 PM

Hello! How are you?

You 12:01 PM

I'm good, thanks! How about you?
